attributes.action: Enforce all new buildings in the UK to be built to a certain environmentally friendly standard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the building phase is the easiest time to install environmentally friendly features into a house. For example in Sweden over 90% of new domestic housing have ground source heat pumps installed. I believe that builders should be made to build houses that are energy efficient, even simple measures like installing energy efficient light fittings would be a step in the right direction.
